mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderBase(orderNo, cusNo, orderDate, cusReq, orderStatus, shopNo) SELECT orderNo_seq.nextval, #{cusNo}, #{orderDate}, #{cusReq}, #{orderStatus}, #{shopNo} FROM DUAL A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM orderBase WHERE cusNo=#{cusNo} AND orderDate=#{orderDate})
mapper.select: SELECT orderNo FROM orderBase WHERE cusNo=#{cusNo} AND orderDate=#{orderDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderProduct(orderPrdNo, orderNo, productNo, productCnt) VALUES (orderProduct_seq.nextval, #{orderNo}, #{productNo}, #{productCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT orderNo, cusNo, orderBase.shopNo, shopName, orderDate, cusReq, orderStatus FROM orderBase, shop WHERE orderBase.shopNo=shop.shopNo
